title: Actuarial Valuations & Predictions
description: While working at Aon Hungary in Budapest, I performed actuarial valuations for German clients, updated assumptions for pension liabilities, and reported results according to accounting standards. Mentored junior team members.

title: Project Management
description: Led planning and implementation of audit software at TraceRiser, doubled as domain expert, and launched beta prototype.

title: Financial Analysis
description: Volunteered as financial analyst for International Child Advancement, reconciled accounts, and prepared financial statements. Oriented and trained new finance volunteers on Quickbooks.

title: Risk Management & Analysis
description: Identified inconsistent partners, produced performance reports for senior management, resolved issues between teams, and reduced debt ledger by 46%.

title: Financial & Compliance Audit
description: Unearthed ghost schools, duplication of bank accounts, and inflated school enrolment data while auditing Ministry of Education. Evaluated efficiency of devolved functions and analyzed compliance with applied law.

title: Sustainable Finance
description: Trained and tested on negotiating sustainability-linked loans, assisting clients in loan defaults and navigating environmental risk management guidelines.
